edu.stanford.ramcloud

Class RAMCloudObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.ramcloud.RAMCloudObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiOpObject

    public class RAMCloudObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is returned by Read operations. It encapsulates the entire object, including the key, value, and version. It mostly exists because Java doesn't support primitive out parameters or multiple return values, and we don't know the object's size ahead of time, so passing in a fixed-length array would be problematic.
